name: hebden-places
title: Hebden Places
description: Locations of interest in Hebden Bridge, West Yorkshire. Mainly comprising retail and public premises. Data was collected in early 2016 during flood recovery work, and is presented as a community asset.

fields.name: name
fields.title: Human readable name of the place

fields.name: comments
fields.title: Comments relating to the place. This is most likely the business or other place that is located in the place. It may not be entirely up-to-date

fields.name: lon
fields.title: Longitude of place to WGS84 datum

fields.name: lat
fields.title: Latitute of place to WGS84 datum
